name: OpenSpec: Archive Completed Change
description: Manual hook to archive a completed OpenSpec change after deployment
prompt:
Help me archive a completed OpenSpec change. Follow these steps:
1. Run `openspec list` to show active changes
2. Ask me which change-id to archive
3. Confirm all tasks in tasks.md are marked [x] complete
4. Ask if this change updated specs (if yes, use `openspec archive <change-id> --yes`, if no use `openspec archive <change-id> --skip-specs --yes`)
5. Run the appropriate archive command
6. Run `openspec validate --strict` to confirm the archived change passes checks
7. Remind me to create a separate PR for the archive if needed
